snippet: PRESSMAN--Arnold, West Orange, died May 9. Husband of Lois for 43 years, he is also survived by his sister Susan Lechtman, nephew Rick, and niece Lisa. Dedicated director of guidance at Glen Rock and Roslyn High Schools. The family will sit shiva on Sunday, May 15 from 1-4pm at 10 Smith Manor Blvd., West Orange. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PRESSMAN--Arnold, West Orange, died May 9. Husband of Lois for 43 years, he is also survived by his sister Susan Lechtman, nephew Rick, and niece Lisa. Dedicated director of guidance at Glen Rock and Roslyn High Schools. The family will sit shiva on Sunday, May 15 from 1-4pm at 10 Smith Manor Blvd., West Orange. 1/3
